SRB/MNE
TANGO EN FLOR
Springtime Festivalito
April 25-27, 2025
Podgorica, Montenegro
Register now!
Event by

Star couple

Maja Petrović
& Marko Miljević
(Croatia)


We are thrilled to announce that the globally renowned tango couple, Maja Petrović and Marko Miljević from Croatia, will be joining us for the first time in Montenegro at Tango en Flor.

With over two decades in tango, including more than ten years as professional performers and teachers, Maja and Marko have captivated communities across Europe, North America, Asia, and Australia.

Many tanguer@s in Montenegro have fallen in love with tango through their videos, and we are incredibly excited to have Maja and Marko perform and teach in Podgorica this April!

Workshops

1.
Technique for everybody:
Feeling and looking good
All levels
We'll start from the head and work our way down to the feet discussing some common problems and their solutions regarding balance, axis, posture and embrace. The focus will be on finding the balance between feeling comfortable on the inside and looking beautiful on the outside. Why choose one when you can have both!
This lesson is intended for both leaders and followers. The students do not have to register in couple. Please bring both socks/ soft shoes and your regular milonga shoes.
2.
Taking a break: Paradas
All levels
Slowing down and making a pause is as important as speeding up and moving continuously. One of the most beautiful movements to express a pause is a parada. For a guaranteed customer satisfaction we shall cover technique, variations, musicality and embellishments in paradas.
3.
D’Arienzo vs. Di Sarli
INT/ADV level
Here we'll discuss the main technical and musical differences between dancing to two legendary tango orchestras. One is known for its rhythmical character, the other for its wonderful melodies. We’ll take standard tango elements and show you how to adjust them to express the qualities of these two orchestras.
4.
Circularity in simple movements
All levels
You like how we dance but can’t exactly say why? One of the answers to that question is in this lesson. Here we'll teach you how to smooth out the edges on your everyday tango elements and make them soft and round.
5.
Milonguero variations
INT/ADV level
In this lesson we’ll teach you 2 fun step combinations in close embrace, perfect for interpreting the more rhythmic and/or energetic part of the song (e.g. a variation). Both combinations can be easily adapted to any amount of space which makes them great for (crowded) milongas.

Mood makers

We've carefully handpicked our DJs to ensure an unending flow of irresistible golden-age melodies that will effortlessly keep you tied to the dance floor.
DJ Anđela Djiki Ristić
(Belgrade)
DJ Toufik Cherifi
(Brussels)
DJ Luka Radunović
(Podgorica)
DJ Maja Petrović
(Zagreb)

Venue

The main events of Tango en Flor will take place at the iconic Hard Rock Cafe Podgorica, located in the heart of the city. All milongas and workshops are set in the upper level of HRC, a beautiful private area that offers views of the main city square.
